posts.post_content:
Price includes shipping with insurance. Payment via Paypal Payment Owed to [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] --- I do most of my dealings in the "T-card forum", so I'm willing to accept paypal goods. 


$495 delivered


My e-mail is [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] if you would like to contact me with any questions or want to make an offer. Offers are always welcome. If you offer 1$, I'll simply say no, and will always respond with a counter, unless i accept. 

Thank you for your time,

Nate
